name: Klee
description: Knights of Favonius Spark Knight! Forever with a bang and a flash! â€”And then disappearing from the stern gaze of Acting Grand Master Jean. Sure, time in solitary confinement gives lots of time to think about new gunpowder formulas...But it'd still be better to not be in solitary in the first place.

skills.name: Kaboom!
skills.description:
Normal Attack: Throws things that go boom when they hit things! Perform up to 3 explosive attacks, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals AoE Pyro DMG to opponents after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack: Gathering the power of Pyro, Klee plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Pyro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Jumpy Dumpty
skills.description:
Jumpy Dumpty is tons of boom-bang-fun!

When thrown, Jumpy Dumpty bounces thrice, igniting and dealing AoE Pyro DMG with every bounce.
On the third bounce, the bomb splits into 8 mines. The mines will explode upon contact with opponents, or after a short period of time, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.
Starts with 2 charges.

skills.name: Sparks 'n' Splash
skills.description: Klee's Blazing Delight! For 10 seconds, summons 5 times 4 Sparks 'n' Splash to attack nearby opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

passives.name: Pounding Surprise
passives.description: When Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

passives.name: Sparkling Burst
passives.description: When Klee's Charged Attack results in a CRIT, all party members gain 2 Elemental Energy.

passives.name: All Of My Treasures!
passives.description: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Mondstadt on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Chained Reactions
constellations.description: Attacks and Skills have a certain chance to summon sparks that bombard opponents, dealing DMG equal to 120% of Sparks 'n' Splash's DMG.

constellations.name: Explosive Frags
constellations.description: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

constellations.name: Exquisite Compound
constellations.description: Increases the level of Jumpy Dumpty by 3. Maximum level is 15.

constellations.name: Sparkly Explosion
constellations.description: If Klee leaves the field during the duration of Sparks 'n' Splash, her departure triggers an explosion that deals 555% of her ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.

constellations.name: Nova Burst
constellations.description: Increases the level of Sparks 'n' Splash by 3. Maximum level is 15.

constellations.name: Blazing Delight
constellations.description:
While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, other members of the party will continuously regenerate Energy.
When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.
